des:
Heatmiser Neo has been designed to offer multi zone smart control for most heating systems, including radiators, electric and water underfloor heating.

The Heatmiser Neo Smart Home skill gives you voice control of your Heatmiser Neo system. 

In addition, as a Smart Home Skill, you can include your Heatmiser Neo devices in Smart Home Routines that you configure in the Alexa app.
